content.text:
# Queensland photo identification card

| valid_jurisdictions =
| document_type       = photo card
| purpose             = Identification
| eligibility         = Residents of Queensland Aged 15 or over
| expiration          = 10 years
| cost = $77.40
|website=https://www.qld.gov.au/transport/licensing/proof-of-age}}
| valid_jurisdictions =
| document_type       = photo card
| purpose             = Identification
| eligibility         = Residents of Queensland Aged 18 or over
| expiration          = 10 years
| cost = $77.40
|website=https://www.qld.gov.au/transport/licensing/proof-of-age}}
The Queensland photo identification card serves as an identity photo card for residents of Queensland who are aged over 15 years.  While it is now available to drivers and non-drivers, it was originally created for people who did not have a driver's licence.  It displays the holder's name, address (optional), date of birth and signature.
Prior to April 2019, the Queensland adult proof of age card was issued for residents of Queensland who are aged over 18 years.
